siteMetadata.description: Senior full stack engineer @geekbot_io, co-organizer of @devitconf & @skgnodejs, host of Devastation Podcast.

posts.excerpt:
MySQL = relational schema and a lot of relations
MongoDB = no relations but flexibility
posts.html: MySQL = relational schema and a lot of relations MongoDB = no relations but flexibility

posts.excerpt: My journey on e-commerce starts a little while after the start of 2014. I had the chance to got my hands on the popular e-commerce platform Magento, during of which i developed 3 big and demanding sites and published some open source Magento…
posts.html:
My journey on e-commerce starts a little while after the start of 2014. I had the chance to got my hands on the popular e-commerce platform Magento, during of which i developed 3 big and demanding sites and published some open source Magento extensions.

snipcart.io

molt.in

shopify

magento EE

frontmatter.title: How does the future of e-commerce looks like?
